sources.title: Ghosks Is the Bunk (1939)
sources.description: Olive reads a ghost story to Popeye and Bluto. Bluto leaves and rigs a haunted house and lures them to it. But they quickly discover him and, even better, a can of invisible paint. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ghosks-is-the-bunk-1939/

metadata.Plot: Olive reads a ghost story to Popeye and Bluto. Bluto leaves and rigs a haunted house and lures them to it. But they quickly discover him and, even better, a can of invisible paint, and they get the better of him.
metadata.Actors: Pinto Colvig, Margie Hines, Jack Mercer
